description: Oaknet Business in Nairobi is actively recruiting for a full-time Software Engineer position. Join our team and contribute to the development and maintenance of our software projects. We are seeking talented individuals with strong programming skills and a passion for problem-solving.

Spark Electric is actively recruiting full-time Electricians in Nyeri. As an Electrician, you will be responsible for installing, maintaining, and repairing electrical systems. Join our team and apply your expertise in providing quality electrical services.

Flow Plumbing is currently hiring for part-time Plumbers in Mombasa. If you have experience in handling plumbing installations and repairs, join our team and assist our customers with their plumbing needs on a flexible schedule.

Solid Welding in Kisumu is not actively hiring at the moment. However, when positions become available, we offer full-time opportunities for skilled Welders to work on various welding projects and contribute to the fabrication process.

Craft Woodworks is actively recruiting for remote Carpenter positions in Nairobi. Join our team and showcase your woodworking skills by crafting high-quality furniture and structures from the comfort of your own workshop.

Leak Fixers is currently hiring part-time Plumbers in Nakuru. If you have expertise in identifying and fixing plumbing leaks, join our team and help our customers resolve their plumbing issues on a flexible basis.

Bright Sparks in Machakos is not actively hiring for Electricians at the moment. However, we offer full-time opportunities for skilled Electricians to work on electrical installations and provide reliable electrical services.

Crafted Homes is actively recruiting for full-time Carpenters in Kericho. Join our team and contribute to the construction of beautiful homes by applying your carpentry skills in the assembly, installation, and repair of wooden structures.

Flow Solutions in Eldoret has a pending internship opportunity for Plumbers. This internship will provide valuable hands-on experience in plumbing systems and installations. Develop your skills under the guidance of experienced professionals.

Metal Works is currently hiring full-time Welders in Nairobi. Join our team and utilize your welding expertise to fabricate metal components, perform repairs, and contribute to the production of high-quality metal products.

Power Tech in Mombasa is not actively hiring Electricians at the moment. However, we occasionally offer part-time opportunities for skilled Electricians to handle electrical installations and repairs as needed.
